property.name: Type
property.value: Hero MP

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +2 life cards. If this attack is stopped, destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero MP

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Whenever your opponent stops one of your attacks, he destroys the top 2 cards of his Life Deck. After your opponent takes damage from one of your attacks, he banishes the top X cards of his Life Deck. X = the number of times he used Endurance

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain MP

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Physical attack. DAMAGE: 3 stages. Destroy one of your opponent's Allies.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain MP

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: If you changed levels this combat, your opponent's personalities lose 2 stages whenever you perform an attack. Otherwise, your opponent's MP loses 1 stage whenever you perform an attack.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain MP

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Physical attack. DAMAGE: 1 life card. Reveal the top 2 cards of your Life Deck. Place 1 into your hand and banish the other. Raise your anger 1 level.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain MP

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Whenever one of your Setup or Drills enters play, destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck. Whenever one of your Setups or Drills enters play during combat, raise your anger 1 level.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero MP

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Banish the top card of your Life Deck to search your Life Deck for a Named card and place it into your hand.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero MP

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +1 life card of damage. Once per combat after using a critical damage effect, you may search your discard pile for a non-Styled card and Rejuvenate it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only.) [CONSTANT]: Your opponent plays with his hand revealed.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only.) POWER: Capture a Dragon Ball. Banish "Dodoria" at the beginning of the next action this combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only.) [CONSTANT]: Life card damage from attacks is banished.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Heroes only.) [CONSTANT]: Whenever a player raises his anger, change that amount to 1.

property.name: Type
property.value: Hero Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Heroes only.) [CONSTANT]: One per turn at the start of your Rejuvenation Step, choose a Drill and destory it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Villain Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only.) [CONSTANT]: After taking damage from a physical attack, you may raise a player's anger 1 level.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Your opponent's energy attacks cost +1 stage to perform. Whenever your opponent Rejuvenates, banish the bottom card of his discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) ENDURANCE 3. POWER: Choose 4 Styled cards in your discard pile and Rejuvenate them. Your opponent chooses 4 Styled cards in his discard pile and Rejuvenates them.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Stops an energy attack. You may choose a card in your opponent's discard pile. If you do, your opponent Rejuvenates that card and you may place a card from each player's discard pile on top of its owner's Life Deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 3. Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +4 stages.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +6 stages. You may not perform physical attacks for the remainder of combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) Physical attack. DAMAGE: 3 stages. Whenever your effects destroy or banish cards from the top of your opponent's Life Deck this combat, increase that amount by 1.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: 4 stages. You may destroy a Setup or Drill you control. If you do, destroy a total of up to 2 Setups and/or Drills.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) Physical attack. DAMAGE: 3 +X stages. X = the number of different card types in your opponent's Banished Zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is discarded from your hand by a card effect, you may place it into play.) [CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +1 life card of damage. Whenever one of your attacks is stopped, lower your opponent's anger 1 level.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Prevent 4 stages and 4 life cards of damage from your opponent's next attack this combat. Your attacks deal +2 life cards of damage this combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is discarded from your hand by a card effect, raise your anger 2 levels. Banish after use.) POWER: Use a critical damage effect. You may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +4 stages. You may discard a card from your hand. If you do, stop your opponent's next energy attack this combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. If you stopped an attack in your opponent's last action, raise your anger 2 levels.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 3 stages. DAMAGE: 5 life cards. Raise your anger 2 levels. HIT: Raise or lower your opponent's anger 2 levels.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 5 life cards. You may discard a card from your hand. If you do, stop your opponent's next physical attack this combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Discard a card from your hand to have your physical attacks deal +1 stage of damage this combat. If you discarded a Dragon Ball, they deal +3 stages instead.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Stops a physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. You may discard a Dragon Ball from your hand. If you do, your physical attacks deal +1 stage of damage.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. Rejuvenate 1. HIT: Rejuvenate 1.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: 5 stages. You may return a Dragon Ball you control to its owner's hand. If you do, your other attacks deal +1 stage of damage this combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) Physical attack. DAMAGE: 5 stages. You may return a Dragon Ball you control to its owner's hand. If you do, your anger cannot be lowered by card effects for the remainder of combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 1 stage. DAMAGE: 5 stages. You may discard a Dragon Ball from your hand. If you do, damage from your attacks cannot be prevented for the remainder of combat.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 2. Energy attack. DAMAGE: 2 life cards. You may discard a Dragon Ball from your hand. If you do, capture a Dragon Ball.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Allies cannot make actions.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Whenver one of your Drills enters play during combat, destroy the top card of your opponent's Life Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 1. [INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: When this card enters play during combat, your opponent destroys the top card of his Life Deck. When this card is leaving play during combat, your opponent destroys the top card of his Life Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 1. POWER: You may destroy any of your Drills. Prevent X stages of damage from your opponent's attacks this combat. X = 1 + the number of Drills you destroyed.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Stops an energy attack. Destroy one of your Drills and then place it back into play at the end of combat.

property.name: Type

property.value: (If this card is discarded from your hand, lower your opponent's anger 1 level.) Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 4 life cards. You may destroy one of your Drills. If you do, lower your opponent's anger 2 levels.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) POWER: Raise your anger 2 levels. For the remainder of combat, your opponent's attacks deal -2 stages and -2 life cards of damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Use a critical damage effect. If you have 2 or more anger, search your discard pile for 2 Drills. Rejuvenate 1 of them and place the other into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 2. POWER: Destroy a Setup. If you have 2 or more anger, you may destroy up to X Setups instead. X = the number of Drills you have in play.

property.value: Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. Attach to your MP. While attached, when your opponent performs a successful attack you may lower your anger 1 level. If you do, prevent 2 life cards of damage from that attack. Destroy this card when you change

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 1. [CONSTANT]: Your energy attacks deal +2 stages of damage and your physical attacks deal +1 life card of damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: (You may only have one "Saiyan Rescue' attached.) POWER: Attach to your MP. Rejuvenate 1. [CONSTANT]: Once per turn as an action, choose a card in your discard pile and Rejuvenate it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 2. Physical attack. DAMAGE: AT +3 stages. Raise your anger 1 level. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. Destroy an Ally.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 2 stages. DAMAGE: 5 life cards. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. HIT: If your MP is a higher personality level than your opponent's MP, Styled cards in your Life Deck without Endurance gain "Endurance 1" this combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 2 per deck. Banish after use.) POWER: Name a Setup or Drill. Search your opponent's Life Deck and hand for all copies of that card and banish them.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 2 per deck. If this card is in play, you may Rejuvenate it as an action. If you use this card a second time this combat, banish after use.) POWER: Stops a Styled phyiscal or Styled energy attack. This card stays in play to be used a second ti

property.name: Text
property.value: (Banish after use.) POWER: Choose a personality in play. That personality loses 4 stages. If that personality's power level is 0, you may banish a Setup or Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is Rejuvenated, you may draw a card.) POWER: Destroy the top 2 cards of each player's Life Deck. Raise your anger 2 levels and lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. Rejuvenate this card.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Ultra Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: (Heroes only. Limit 2 per deck.) POWER: Gain 2 stages. Choose a Physical Combat, Energy Combat, or Event from your discard pile and place it on top of your Life Deck. You may shuffle this card into your Life Deck after use.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Ultra Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only. Limit 2 per deck. Banish after use.) ENDURANCE 2. POWER: Setups and Drills cannot be used this combat. Search your Life Deck for a Styled Drill and place it into play.
